sentences.en: ...long-term assignments that allowed them total immersion in their subjects.
sentences.cn: ...可使他们能潜心钻研自己课题的长期任务。

sentences.en: An immersion - typed drainage hollow fiber membrane component is adopted.
sentences.cn: 采用浸没式疏水性中空纤维膜组件.

sentences.en: Full seeds should be completely dried after immersion and should be sown the same year.
sentences.cn: 饱满的种子在浸种后应当使其完全干燥,并应在当年播种.

sentences.en: Immersion coolers with chilled water circulation are often used for churn milk.
sentences.cn: 带有冷水循环系统的浸泡冷却品经常可以用来搅拌牛乳.

sentences.en: Immersion in another country's educational system enhances their academic and personal growth.
sentences.cn: 融入外国的教育体制,加强了他们的学业与个人成长.

sentences.en: Immersion in cold water resulted in rapid loss of heat.
sentences.cn: 浸泡在冷水中导致热量迅速散失。

sentences.en: Iron or steel placed in copper sulfate also receives a loose immersion deposit.
sentences.cn: 铁或钢放入硫酸铜中,也会生成疏松的浸镀层.

sentences.en: It is like the sense of chill that follows immersion of the hand in a volatile liquid.
sentences.cn: 这很像把手浸入挥发性液体后的那种凉飕飕的感觉.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To optimize the water immersion extraction technology of Kunzaotiaozhi capsules.
sentences.cn: 目的: 优选昆藻调脂胶囊的最佳水提工艺.

sentences.en: Since 1960, many horizontal immersion extractors have been introduced.
sentences.cn: 自1960年以来, 采用了许多水平浸提装置.

sentences.en: Such immersion or displacement deposits are usually spongy and black.
sentences.cn: 这种浸镀或置换是海棉状和黑色的.

sentences.en: The dirt on the bottom of the bath didn't encourage total immersion.
sentences.cn: 浴缸底有污垢,不宜全身浸泡于其中.

sentences.en: The intellectual control of floating docks immersion is an integrated system engineering.
sentences.cn: 浮船坞沉浮的智能控制是一项综合的系统工程.

sentences.en: The simplest concept is the " immersion " gust.
sentences.cn: 最简单的概念是 “ 浸湿 ” 突风.

sentences.en: This can be eliminated by placing the model in an immersion cell.
sentences.cn: 可将模型置于浸没液槽中,以消除此种误差.

sentences.en: Two extraction methods have been studied: liquid - liquid extraction and immersion solid - phase microextraction.
sentences.cn: 对比研究了液 - 液萃取和浸渍式固相微萃取方法对葡萄酒中香气成分的萃取特点.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 电热煮沸器；浸没式加热器
浸渍试验，浸泡试验；浸没试验

trans.tran_en: the action of immersing something in liquid, or the state of being immersed
